Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Device information and control.
Category.Description: Category for Device information and control.

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Image Format Control features.
Category.Description: Category for Image Format Control features.

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.
Category.Description: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the transport layer control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the transport layer control features.

Category.Name: SimulationControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for the simulation control features.
Category.Description: Category for the simulation control features.

Category.Name: AnalogControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Analog control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Analog control features.

Category.Name: DigitalIOControl
Category.ToolTip: Digital I/O covers the features required to control the general Input and Output signals of the camera.
Category.Description: Digital I/O covers the features required to control the general Input and Output signals of the camera.

Category.Name: TriggerControl
Category.ToolTip: The Trigger Control section describes all features related to image acquisition using trigger(s).
Category.Description: The Trigger Control section describes all features related to image acquisition using trigger(s).

Category.Name: TimerControl
Category.ToolTip: The Timer Control lists all features that relates to control and monitoring of Timers.
Category.Description: The Timer Control lists all features that relates to control and monitoring of Timers.

Category.Name: Support
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the support features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the support features.

Category.Name: CXP
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the CXP features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the CXP features.

Float.Name: LineDuration
Float.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds(us) to apply between each line.

Float.Name: FrameDuration
Float.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds(us) to apply between each frame.

Float.Name: ActiveDuration
Float.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds(us) to apply between each frame.

Enumeration.Name: Vod
Enumeration.ToolTip: TX VOD settings.
Enumeration.Description: TX VOD settings.

Enumeration.Name: PreEmphasis
Enumeration.ToolTip: Transmitter Pre-Emphasis Levels.
Enumeration.Description: Transmitter Pre-Emphasis Levels.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: Name of the manufacturer of the device.
StringReg.Description: Name of the manufacturer of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceModelName
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature provides the model of the device.
StringReg.Description: This feature provides the model of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceManufacturerInfo
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature provides extended manufacturer information about the device.
StringReg.Description: This feature provides extended manufacturer information about the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature provides the version of the device.
StringReg.Description: This feature provides the version of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceID
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature stores a camera identifier.
StringReg.Description: This feature stores a camera identifier.

Command.Name: DeviceReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the device to its power up state.
Command.Description: Resets the device to its power up state.

Enumeration.Name: LinkDiscovery
Enumeration.ToolTip: Discovery speed settings.
Enumeration.Description: Discovery speed settings.

Enumeration.Name: SimulationTriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature controls the transmission trigger mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: This feature controls the transmission trigger mode of the device.

Enumeration.Name: SimulationTriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.

Enumeration.Name: SimulationTriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its SimulationTriggerMode set to On.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its SimulationTriggerMode set to On.

Integer.Name: SimulationTriggerDelay
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the delay in microseconds(us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.
Integer.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds(us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.

Float.Name: SimulationTriggerFilter
Float.ToolTip: Filter for trigger, helps prevent signal de-bouncing. 8ns resolution, units in microseconds(us).
Float.Description: Filter for trigger, helps prevent signal de-bouncing. 8ns resolution, units in microseconds(us).

Command.Name: SimulationTriggerSoftware
Command.ToolTip: Generates an internal trigger. SimulationTriggerSource must be set to Software.
Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger. SimulationTriggerSource must be set to Software.

Enumeration.Name: SimulationTriggerEventMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the trigger event generation mode.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the trigger event generation mode.

Enumeration.Name: TimerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Timer to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Timer to configure.

Float.Name: TimerDelay
Float.ToolTip: Sets the duration in microseconds(us) of the delay to apply at the reception of a trigger before starting the Timer.
Float.Description: Sets the duration in microseconds(us) of the delay to apply at the reception of a trigger before starting the Timer.

Float.Name: TimerDuration
Float.ToolTip: Sets the duration in microseconds(us) of the Timer pulse.
Float.Description: Sets the duration in microseconds(us) of the Timer pulse.

Enumeration.Name: TimerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the activation mode of the trigger to start the Counter.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the activation mode of the trigger to start the Counter.

Boolean.Name: TimerOutputInverter
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls the inversion of the timer output signal.
Boolean.Description: Controls the inversion of the timer output signal.

Enumeration.Name: TimerTriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the source of the trigger to start the Timer.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the source of the trigger to start the Timer.

Command.Name: TimerTriggerSoftware
Command.ToolTip: Generates an internal trigger . TimerTriggerSource must be set to Software.
Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger. TimerTriggerSource must be set to Software.

IntReg.Name: TimerTriggerSoftwareReg
IntReg.ToolTip: Issue the Trigger Software command to Timer.

Command.Name: TimerReset
Command.ToolTip: Does a software reset of the selected timer and starts it. The timer starts immediately after the reset unless a timer trigger is active.
Command.Description: Does a software reset of the selected timer and starts it. The timer starts immediately after the reset unless a timer trigger is active.

Enumeration.Name: TimerEventMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the activation mode of the trigger to start the Counter.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the activation mode of the trigger to start the Counter.

Enumeration.Name: LineSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the physical pin of the external camera connectors.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the physical pin of the external camera connectors.

Boolean.Name: LineStatus
Boolean.ToolTip: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line.
Boolean.Description: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line.

Enumeration.Name: LineMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.

Boolean.Name: LineInverter
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output Line.
Boolean.Description: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output Line.

Enumeration.Name: LineFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the current electrical format of the selected physical input or output Line.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the current electrical format of the selected physical input or output Line.

Enumeration.Name: LineSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected Line.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected Line.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the actual image width expelled by the camera (in pixels).
Integer.Description: This feature represents the actual image width expelled by the camera (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the actual image height expelled by the camera (in pixels).
Integer.Description: This feature represents the actual image height expelled by the camera (in pixels).

Integer.Name: WidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum width (in pixels) of the image.
Integer.Description: Maximum width (in pixels) of the image. The dimension is calculated after horizontal binning, decimation or any other function changing the horizontal dimension of the image.

Integer.Name: HeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum height (in pixels) of the image.
Integer.Description: Maximum height (in pixels) of the image. This dimension is calculated after vertical binning, decimation or any other function changing the vertical dimension of the image.

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature indicates the format of the pixel to use during the acquisition.
Enumeration.Description: This feature indicates the format of the pixel to use during the acquisition.

Enumeration.Name: ScanMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicates whether generated picture is progressive or interlaced.
Enumeration.Description: Indicates whether generated picture is progressive or interlaced.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature controls the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: This feature controls the acquisition mode of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: This feature starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: This feature starts the Acquisition of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: This feature stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: This feature stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to be sent in MultiFrame AcquisitionMode.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to be sent in MultiFrame AcquisitionMode.

Float.Name: InstantFPS
Float.ToolTip: Instantly calculated frame rate in Hz.

StringReg.Name: SourceFilePath
StringReg.Description: Path to a file if single file is selected as video source.

StringReg.Name: SourceFolderPath
StringReg.Description: Path of a folder if folder with multiple files is selected as video source.

Enumeration.Name: VideoSourceType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Type of video source for stream generation.
Enumeration.Description: Type of video source for stream generation.

Enumeration.Name: VideoSourceFileType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Type of video source file in case source is folder.
Enumeration.Description: Type of video source file in case source is folder.

Enumeration.Name: VideoSourcePatternType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Type of pattern in case pattern source is selected.
Enumeration.Description: Type of pattern in case pattern source is selected.

Integer.Name: VideoSourceFileCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of files to read in case source is folder.
Integer.Description: Number of files to read in case source is folder.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel. This includes any end-of-line, end-of-frame statistics or other stamp data. This is the total size of data payload for a data block.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTapGeometry
Enumeration.ToolTip: This device tap geometry feature describes the geometrical properties characterizing the taps of a camera as presented at the output of the device.
Enumeration.Description: This device tap geometry feature describes the geometrical properties characterizing the taps of a camera as presented at the output of the device.

Integer.Name: VersionsSupported
Integer.ToolTip: Bitmask containing all supported version(s) of the CoaXPress specification.
Integer.Description: Bootstrap register. The bitmask indicates all version(s) of the CoaXPress specification supported by the Device.

Enumeration.Name: VersionUsed
Enumeration.ToolTip: Version of the CoaXPress specification currently used.
Enumeration.Description: Currently selected version of the CoaXPress specification used to communicate between the Device and Host.

Float.Name: LowSpeedTimeout
Float.ToolTip: Low Speed timeout. 8ns resolution, units in microseconds(us).
Float.Description: Low Speed timeout. 8ns resolution, units in microseconds(us). Default value is 800ms

Float.Name: HeartbeatPeriod
Float.ToolTip: Heartbeat period. 8ns resolution, units in microseconds(us).
Float.Description: Heartbeat period. 8ns resolution, units in microseconds(us). Default value is 10ms

Enumeration.Name: LinkConfig
Enumeration.ToolTip: Bootstrap register LinkConfig.
Enumeration.Description: Bootstrap register LinkConfig.

Enumeration.Name: LinkConfigDefault
Enumeration.ToolTip: Bootstrap register LinkConfigDefault.
Enumeration.Description: Bootstrap register LinkConfigDefault.

Enumeration.Name: PoCXP0
Enumeration.ToolTip: Device PoCXP channel 0 control.
Enumeration.Description: Device PoCXP channel 0 control.

Enumeration.Name: PoCXP1
Enumeration.ToolTip: Device PoCXP channel 1 control.
Enumeration.Description: Device PoCXP channel 1 control.

Enumeration.Name: PoCXP2
Enumeration.ToolTip: Device PoCXP channel 2 control.
Enumeration.Description: Device PoCXP channel 2 control.

Enumeration.Name: PoCXP3
Enumeration.ToolTip: Device PoCXP channel 3 control.
Enumeration.Description: Device PoCXP channel 3 control.

Enumeration.Name: PoCXP_Resistor0
Enumeration.ToolTip: Device PoCXP Resistor channel 0 control.
Enumeration.Description: Device PoCXP Resistor channel 0 control.

Enumeration.Name: PoCXP_Resistor1
Enumeration.ToolTip: Device PoCXP Resistor channel 1 control.
Enumeration.Description: Device PoCXP Resistor channel 1 control.

Enumeration.Name: PoCXP_Resistor2
Enumeration.ToolTip: Device PoCXP Resistor channel 2 control.
Enumeration.Description: Device PoCXP Resistor channel 2 control.

Enumeration.Name: PoCXP_Resistor3
Enumeration.ToolTip: Device PoCXP Resistor channel 3 control.
Enumeration.Description: Device PoCXP Resistor channel 3 control.

StringReg.Name: DeviceFirmwareVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: Version of the firmware in the device.
StringReg.Description: Version of the firmware in the device.

Integer.Name: MaxLinks
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum available links on the device.
Integer.Description: Maximum available links on the device.

Integer.Name: DevicePciLanes
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum available lanes on the device PCIe slot.
Integer.Description: Maximum available lanes on the device PCIe slot.

Port.Name: Device
Port.ToolTip: Port giving access to the device.
